applyTo: '**/*.ts **/*.tsx **/*.js **/*.jsx'
---
Avoid the usage of useEffect(). Prefer reactquery and tanstack query.
Always use tailwindcss for styling instead of inline styles.
Do not use any class based components. Always use functional components with hooks.
Do not use any state management libraries like Redux or MobX. Prefer using React's built-in context API or reactquery for state management.
Always organize and structure your components in a way that promotes reusability and maintainability.
Always use best practices for accessibility (a11y) to ensure your application is usable by all users.
Code should be properly organized and follow a consistent structure.
